column1: COVID-19 cases are rising again. Stay safe everyone!
The vaccine rollout is going well in our country. Feeling hopeful! #vaccinated
I'm worried about the new variant of COVID-19. What are your thoughts?
Can't believe it's been over a year dealing with COVID-19. Time flies.
Just got my second dose of the vaccine. Feeling relieved! #COVID19
The impact of COVID-19 on mental health is massive. We need more support systems.
Watching the news about COVID-19 is exhausting. Need a break!
Social distancing is still important even if you're vaccinated. #StaySafe
The economy is slowly recovering from the COVID-19 impact. Fingers crossed!
Schools are reopening with safety measures in place. How do parents feel about this?
Traveling during COVID-19 is risky, but some places are handling it well.
The new variant is spreading fast. Stay informed and take precautions!
Local businesses are struggling due to COVID-19. Support them if you can!
COVID-19 has changed how we work, with more people working from home.
Finally, some good news about COVID-19 vaccines for children. #Hopeful
Seeing loved ones through a screen isn't the same. Missing family during COVID-19.
Can't wait for life to return to normal after COVID-19. What do you miss most?
